meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7552.

td.p: Dylan Watton, a communications coordinator from Rockaway Beach, New York
Stan Jastrzebski, a broadcast journalist from Lafayette, Indiana
Tucker Dunn, an ESL teacher from Tucson, Arizona (whose 2-day cash winnings total $27,600)

tr.td: THE NATIONAL WOMEN'S HALL OF FAME
BIG TEN SCHOOLS
"J" WORDS
JOBS TAKEN BY AUTOMATONS
AROUND THE WORLD
A BEATLES SONG & MOVIE TITLE

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'The hall is housed in Seneca Falls in this state, the birthplace of the American women\'s rights movement')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: The hall is housed in Seneca Falls in this state, the birthplace of the American women's rights movement
